content: DD-WCS water dam ### Categories: Home > Products > Dust and water management > Drill stand mounted water collectors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Enables clean drilling overhead Collect up to 100% of slurry Applications Can be used with the WMS 100 water management system or a vacuum cleaner Should be used with water collector holders Should be fixed to a drill stand ### TECHNICAL DATA: Accessory type: Water management systems Product information: Water dam for diameters up to 87 mm For use with: DD 120, DD 150-U, DD 160, DD 200, DD 250, DD 250-CA, DD 350-CA, DD 500-CA Technical Data | Accessory type | Water management systems | Product information | Water dam for diameters up to 87 mm | For use with | DD 120, DD 150-U, DD 160, DD 200, DD 250, DD 250-CA, DD 350-CA, DD 500-CA | Additional Accessory Information | Water dam for diameters up to 87 mm ### ITEMS- 232204 - DD-WCS water dam - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DD-WC-S Water dam
